archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Authorize Transaction Based on Balance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manages authorization of service/ product requests based on available balances (monetary or non-monetary) and policies.

properties.value: This process may include balance reservation and must be performed online. Subsequent balance updates are not required to be done in real-time. In this context a service is provided by the network, e.g. voice call. Product is digital content delivered via the network, e.g. content such as music, games, etc.
